title: Constraint Resolution Engine Definition (CRED)
description: Defines the canonical execution syntax and structure for complex axiomatic constraint validation functions (PVLM, MPAM) used by the GAX Agent, ensuring deterministic policy evaluation.

constraint_type.description: Classifier for the policy (PVLM or MPAM logic).

function_handle.description: The standardized function or API endpoint used by GAX to load and execute this constraint logic.

required_inputs.description: List of required fields/metrics from the Axiomatic State Manifest (ASM) needed for evaluation.

logic_definition.description: Payload structure containing the executable constraint logic (e.g., DSL, symbolic computation tree).
